title: Relation of Alzheimer's disease-related TDP-43 proteinopathy to metrics from diffusion tensor imaging (DTI) and neurite orientation dispersion and density imaging …

abstract: Transactive response DNA-binding protein 43 kDa (TDP-43) deposition is linked to regional brain atrophy in Alzheimer's disease (AD), but diffusion changes associated with AD-related TDP-43 proteinopathy remain underexplored. This study evaluates …

abstract: Background Medication costs and their impact on patients are challenging to infer in real-world practice. We propose a pragmatic approach that leverages EHR medication data and a novel natural language processing (NLP) approach to define …
